short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add extra functionality to qTest Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension is designed to make job easier by making it simpler to do test case review process and improving some aspects of user experience of qTest Manager application. By doing so, it can save valuable time, allowing to focus on the things that matter most. With this tool at your disposal, you can work smarter, not harder, and accomplish work with greater ease and efficiency.

Key features are:
- Copy test case number, name, and link to share with a single click
- Highlight any changes in the test case history window
- Navigate to the latest revision of a test case automatically
- Close dialogs using the Escape keyboard key

In conclusion, this browser extension is a game-changer for anyone who needs to review test cases. It simplifies the process, saves time, and helps you achieve your goals faster. So why not give it a try today and see the difference it can make in your work? Together, we can achieve great things and revolutionize the way we do test case reviews.

***

Free.
Open source.
From users to users.
